posts.post_content:
Hey all,

I had this sold a couple months ago here, but postponed the sale as a member had a person issue and needed to put the $ to work there, so I refunded and held onto this card. Back on the market now, as he doesn’t go with the HOFer backs run.

Looking to sell or maybe trade this Elite 11 Germany Schaefer Piedmont 350. I’m not sure what to price it, heard a couple of 5’s sold around 3k and 5k at the peak. Was thinking about rolling the dice and sending it to auction for fun, but would rather keep it in our community if possible.

SOLD

Would trade for T213 HOFer..

Let me know if any interest,
Bob
PM or email to [url]upperhandisforemost@yahoo.com[/url]

Back on the market bump.

Thanks,
Bob

Big ol price drop bump.

Thanks,
Bob
